modName: Dungeons and Dragons Classes for Skyrim via BAT files
summary: I made 10 Classes: 4 Combat Type, 3 Magic and 3 Stealth. I named them as classes from Dungeon & Dragons but made them following the morrowind/oblivion class system. Each class has a power in addition to the race power. There aren\'t free perks.
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------DESCRIPTION-----------------------------------
Each Class is made in the following way:
- Major Skills: Each Class has 3 Major Skills, this skills start at 40
- Minore Skills: Each Class has 3 Minore Skills, this skills start at 25.
- Miscellanous Skills: Others skills start at 15.

- Primary Attribute: Each Class has a Primary Attribute wich grant a +50 Bonus to Health, Magicka or Stamina. Health, Magicka and Stamina stats at 100 as standard.

- Specialization: Each Class has as Specialization: Combat, Magic or Stealth skills. A Specialization grant a +5 Bonus in every skill of that sub-type. 

Spells: If a Magic Skill is a Major Skill, the Class will have every Novice Spell known. If it\'s a Minore Skills, will provide only one Novice Spell. Flames and Healing spells are known by every class. 

------------------------------HOW TO USE-----------------------------------

1) Open the Folder
2) Pick a class and a race or everything
3) Place inside your Skyrim folder, where your Skyrim.exe resides
4) Type \"bat <Classname>\" in the console in game

NOTE!: This Mod mantaine your skills progression and let them to go over 100, so you can use it at level 1 or at level 50, it\'s the same.

Issue: Since Classes have a Power based on Race or Stone Powers, you can\'t have two same Powers (Example: You are a Redguard Warrior, you can\'t have two Adrenaline Rushes).
author: hotice94
